attributes.action: stop ISPs from treating their customers and their families as criminals by cutting off their internet access without proof of their guilt which should only be decided in a court and not because some party with a vested interest thinks a violation has taken place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this country we are supposed to be inocent until proven guilty. We are not guilty just because a vested interest says it thinks a violation has taken place
